# OpenClaw Equipment — llms.txt
# https://equipment.openclaw.com
# Last updated: 2026-02-21

## What is OpenClaw Equipment?
OpenClaw Equipment is a package registry for AI agent tools — MCP servers, OpenClaw skills, and developer utilities. Agents can search, discover, and install packages programmatically via a structured JSON API. Think npm, but for agent tooling.

## API Base URL
https://equipment.openclaw.com/api

## Endpoints

### Search Packages
GET /api/packages/search?q={query}&category={category}&limit={limit}&offset={offset}

Parameters:
- q (string, optional): Search query — matches name, description, tags
- category (string, optional): Filter by category slug (mcp-tools, openclaw-skills, dev-tools, software, models, resources)
- sort (string, optional): relevance | downloads | rating | newest
- limit (integer, optional): Results per page, max 100, default 20
- offset (integer, optional): Pagination offset

Example:
  GET /api/packages/search?q=github&category=mcp-tools

Response:
```json
{
  "packages": [
    {
      "name": "GitHub MCP Server",
      "slug": "github-mcp-server",
      "description": "Access GitHub repos, issues, PRs, and actions through MCP",
      "category": "mcp-tools",
      "version": "2025.1.14",
      "install": "npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-github",
      "source": "https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers",
      "compatibility": ["claude", "openai", "openclaw"],
      "downloads": 89000,
      "rating": 4.6,
      "tags": ["github", "git", "vcs", "code"],
      "llm_summary": "MCP server providing tools for GitHub repository management — create/read issues, PRs, files, branches. Requires GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN env var."
    }
  ],
  "total": 1,
  "query": "github",
  "limit": 20,
  "offset": 0
}
```

### Get Package Details
GET /api/packages/{slug}

Example:
  GET /api/packages/filesystem-mcp-server

Returns full package detail including versions, reviews, and install instructions.

### Featured Packages
GET /api/packages/featured

Returns curated list of top-rated and most-downloaded packages across all categories.

### List Categories
GET /api/packages/categories

Returns all categories with package counts:
```json
{
  "categories": [
    { "slug": "mcp-tools", "name": "MCP Tools", "description": "Model Context Protocol servers", "package_count": 10 },
    { "slug": "openclaw-skills", "name": "OpenClaw Skills", "description": "Skills for OpenClaw agents", "package_count": 5 },
    { "slug": "dev-tools", "name": "Developer Tools", "description": "CLI tools and utilities", "package_count": 5 }
  ]
}
```

### Full Registry Dump
GET /api/registry.json

Returns all packages in a single JSON payload. Useful for agents that want to cache the full registry locally.

## Install Instructions by Package Type

### MCP Servers (Node.js)
```bash
npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem /path/to/dir
```
Or add to your MCP client config (Claude Desktop, VS Code, OpenClaw):
```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "filesystem": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem", "/path/to/dir"]
    }
  }
}
```

### OpenClaw Skills
```bash
openclaw skill install weather
openclaw skill install github
```

### Developer Tools (system packages)
```bash
# macOS
brew install yt-dlp ffmpeg jq ripgrep imagemagick

# Ubuntu/Debian
apt install yt-dlp ffmpeg jq ripgrep imagemagick

# Using pip
pip install yt-dlp
```

## Notes for Agents
- All responses are JSON with consistent structure
- The `llm_summary` field on each package is optimized for LLM context windows
- Use `category` filter to narrow results by type
- Package `slug` values are URL-safe identifiers
- Rate limiting: 100 requests/minute per IP
